This Class used for Manage Database Operations.

ExecuteQuary

public java.lang.Object ExecuteQuary(java.lang.String qsql)
Method used to Execute Selact SQL.

Parameters:

Returns:
Vector with dataobj Objects. dataobj holds data of each records. Value of each fields are stored as data object.

FieldTypesmeta

public java.lang.String FieldTypesmeta(java.lang.String isql)
Method used to get MetaData of a Table.

Parameters:
isql - SELECT SQL MetaData of a Table.
Returns:
A formatted String with Details of MetaData. Used '&' Separator to separate value of each field. Used '=' Separator to separate field name and field type of each field value.
See Also:
Connection, Statement
